about_the_game:
The long-awaited follow up to the hugely successful Classic Fantasy Music Pack is here! Volume 2 brings you more of the same classic sounding game themes to give your game more of that authentic 90s classic gaming era sound! Featuring themes reminiscent of Final Fantasy, Chrono Trigger, Zelda and more, with vintage synthesizers, classic orchestras, choirs, and action-heavy battle themes. As well, both battle themes have dungeon variations with completely different instrumentation for use during dungeon exploration.

This pack also contains both full mixes and many tracks also have a version without lead instruments so you can use the track as more of a background piece of music. Classic Fantasy Music Pack Vol 2 will surely add a great new palette of musical themes to your RPG and Fantasy games!

Features:

* 22 royalty-free songs in ogg, mp3, m4a and wav formats
* Tracks with lead melody also have an alternate mix without lead for more subtle, background use
* Classic 90s JRPG compositional style
* For use in RPG Maker MZ or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

Endless Battle
Endless Battle - Dungeon Version
Battle of the Century
Battle of the Century - Dungeon Variation
Easy Bossa Times
Easy Boss Times - No Lead
Memories and Magic
Memories and Magic - No Lead
Theme For Peace
Forest of Secrets
Forest of Secrets - No Lead
Kingdom Theme
Kingdom Theme - No Lead
Ravel - Bolero
Window Shopping
Fields of Harmony
Morning Sunlight
Game Menu
Dungeon Exploration
Mystery World
To The Skies
To The Skies - No Lead
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Classic Fantasy Music Pack Vol 2" and "RPG Maker MV - Classic Fantasy Music Pack Vol 2" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!
